mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.goods_id, g.name AS goodsName, g.price, g.image_url, c.quantity, c.is_checked FROM cart c LEFT JOIN goods g ON c.goods_id = g.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM cart WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND goods_id = #{goodsId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (user_id, goods_id, quantity, is_checked) VALUES (#{userId}, #{goodsId}, #{quantity}, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET quantity = #{quantity} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_checked = 1
